name: Bulletproof Guide to Becoming a PAID Front-End Developer eBook
title: Let me show you what it REALLY takes to land your first developer job in 2022.
subTitle: No BS. No false promises. Just a step-by-step system that actually works.

mainFeatures.feature: A Bulletproof 6 Month Plan to Learning Front-End Development
mainFeatures.description: from finding what to focus on, to growing your skills, to building your portfolio and acing the interview

mainFeatures.feature: What My Most Successful Students Do That Puts Them Ahead of the Rest
mainFeatures.description: no sugar coating. I'll show you exactly what you need to do, and how to stand above the rest of the competition and excel as a programmer

mainFeatures.feature: An Easy-to-Implement Study Strategy Proven to Enhance Learning, Memory & Recall
mainFeatures.description: nobody talks about this, and yet, it is a key component for successfully learning to code and continue your journey as a excellent front-end developer

name: Bulletproof Guide to Becoming a PAID Front-End Developer Extras
shortName: Two Essential Downloadable Plans (+ Secret Bonus Checklist)
title: Bulletproof Front-End Developer Guide Downloadable Extras
subTitle: Put your learning into action with checklists, pdf's, and more!

downloads.name: 6-Month Front-End Roadmap
downloads.description: Know EXACTLY what you need to learn every month to become a paid front-end developer in 6-months! Check off each lesson once completed and see your progress across time to inspire and motivate further action towards your goals.
